title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
description: A classic film camera from the 1950s in excellent condition. This collectible piece features a mechanical rangefinder and is highly sought after by photography enthusiasts.

title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
description: Vintage Gibson SG in cherry red finish with original PAF pickups. This iconic instrument has been professionally maintained and produces the classic Gibson tone.

title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
description: The computer that changed everything. This original Macintosh is in working condition with the original keyboard and mouse. A true piece of computing history.

title: Rolex Submariner 16610
description: Classic stainless steel Rolex Submariner with black dial and bezel. This timepiece comes with all original documentation and box.

title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A rare first edition, first printing of this American classic novel published in 1925. The book maintains its original dust jacket and is in remarkable condition.

title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
description: Authentic Herman Miller Eames lounge chair and ottoman in rosewood and black leather. This iconic piece of furniture design history is in excellent condition.

title: Banksy Original Screen Print
description: Limited edition screen print signed and numbered by the elusive street artist Banksy. Comes with certificate of authenticity from Pest Control.

title: 1957 Fender Stratocaster Guitar
description: Vintage Fender Stratocaster in sunburst finish with maple neck. This instrument has been played but well-maintained and carries the distinctive tone of early Stratocasters.

title: Rare Patek Philippe Nautilus 5711
description: One of the most sought-after luxury watches in the world. This stainless steel Nautilus features the iconic blue dial and comes with full documentation.

title: Original Star Wars Movie Poster (1977)
description: Style C poster from the original theatrical release of Star Wars. This rare poster is in very good condition and has been professionally framed.
